english.segment1: I'm on the mezzanine floor, Never been here before no no. It's a lonely place, But a house full of grace
english.segment2: And I'll get to heaven. Yes, I'll get to heaven
english.segment3: I'm at this bolted door, but I'm. Coming through without permission. If I go they say I'm wrong, If I stay there'll be no song
english.segment4: And I'll get to heaven. Yes, I'll get to heaven.
